heading: HR00007
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ALONG WITH THE OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE DELAYS AND POOR IMPLEMENTATION OF THE SCHOOL INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION THROUGH THE PUBLIC-PRIVATE PARTNERSHIP (PPP) PROGRAM AND PROPOSE REMEDIAL MEASURES THEREOF

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00007
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ALONG WITH THE OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE DELAYS AND POOR IMPLEMENTATION OF THE SCHOOL INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION THROUGH THE PUBLIC-PRIVATE PARTNERSHIP (PPP) PROGRAM AND PROPOSE REMEDIAL MEASURES THEREOF
